document_data.name: Ayana No-Shui
document_data.mainbody: '''Ayana No-Shui''' was a [[wu jen]] in the [[Northern Wastes]] of [[Kara-Tur]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Over her years of travel and adventure Ayana accumulated a number of magical items. These included an ''[[amulet of communication]]'', a ''[[bell of warning]]'', and a set of ''[[drums of thunder]]''.
document_data.History:
Born with the mark of the [[maraloi]], Ayana was always destined to become a wu jen. For a time, she acted as an adventurer throughout [[Kara-Tur]] but in the end Ayana went back to her home country, the [[Symorok Valley]].

There, Ayana acted as prime counsel to the chieftain [[Shan Khantayan]].
